title: SolviroStudio extra-long single-page portfolio (scroll sections, brand gradient, contact form)

requirements.summary: Create a single-page, extra-long scrolling layout with a fixed top navigation that scrolls to in-page sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation is visible and includes exactly: Home, Portfolio, About Us, Services, Client Results, Testimonials, Contact Us.
Clicking a nav item scrolls to the corresponding section on the same page (anchor/scroll behavior).
Page scroll length is clearly “extra long” with all requested sections and substantial vertical spacing/content.

file_operations.description: Create the single-page layout that renders all required sections in order and implements fixed top navigation with in-page scroll/anchor behavior (e.g., scrollIntoView) for: Home, Portfolio, About Us, Services, Client Results, Testimonials, Contact Us. Use shadcn-ui primitives (e.g., Button/Card) to keep layout consistent. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a fixed/sticky top navigation component that renders exactly the required labels and triggers smooth scroll to corresponding section IDs. Use shadcn-ui Button (or equivalent) for nav items. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the new App entry and ensure global styles are imported correctly so the single-page layout and fixed nav render as intended.

requirements.summary: Implement the site-wide brand visual system with the specified colors and consistent #FFD233→#FFA500→#FF6A00 gradient for buttons/accents/highlights.
acceptanceCriteria: Primary buttons and key accents use the specified brand colors and/or the specified gradient.
The gradient (#FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00) is used consistently for highlights (e.g., CTAs, section dividers, icon fills, badges) without introducing additional competing primary brand colors.
Overall layout is modern/clean with clear hierarchy, readable typography, and trustworthy visual presentation.

file_operations.description: Extend Tailwind theme tokens to include SolviroStudio brand colors and a named gradient utility approach (via CSS variables/classes) to enforce consistent usage across buttons, accents, badges, and section dividers.

Define global CSS variables/classes for brand colors (#FFD233, #FFA500, #FF6A00) and a reusable gradient treatment (#FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00). Add base typography/layout defaults for a modern, clean, professional look without introducing additional primary brand colors.

Create a reusable CTA button wrapper that applies the brand gradient styling consistently across the site (used by all section CTAs). Prefer composing shadcn-ui Button. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Build the Hero section with the exact provided headline/subheadline/CTA label and a professional gradient background.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero headline matches exactly: “SolviroStudio – Meta Ads & Creative Designs That Solve Your Solar Business Challenges”.
Hero subheadline matches exactly: “We help solar companies attract leads, engage their audience, and maximize ROI with creative campaigns.”
Hero contains a primary CTA button labeled exactly “Get Started Now”.
Hero background is a gradient using #FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00.

file_operations.description: Implement the Hero (Home) section with the exact headline/subheadline/CTA label, and apply the required brand gradient background. Use GradientButton (composed from shadcn-ui Button) for the primary CTA. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire HeroSection into the top of the single-page layout with the section ID used by the Home nav item and CTA scroll behavior.

requirements.summary: Create the About section with the exact provided text, render the team illustration visual, and include a “Learn More” CTA.
acceptanceCriteria: About section contains the exact provided paragraph.
About section includes a visual area rendering the provided/generated team illustration asset (or a placeholder if assets are not yet present).
About section includes a CTA button labeled exactly “Learn More”.

file_operations.description: Create About Us section with the exact provided paragraph, a visual area rendering frontend/public/assets/generated/team-illustration.dim_1200x800.png, and a CTA button labeled exactly “Learn More” using GradientButton. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire AboutSection into the page with the correct section ID for nav/scroll targeting and CTA behavior.

requirements.summary: Create the Services section listing exactly three services with 1–2 sentence descriptions each and an “Explore Services” CTA.
acceptanceCriteria: Services section displays the three service titles exactly as specified.
Each service includes a 1–2 sentence description in English focused on solar-company outcomes (leads/engagement/ROI).
Services section includes a CTA button labeled exactly “Explore Services”.

file_operations.description: Implement Services section with exactly three service cards (titles exactly as specified) and 1–2 sentence outcome-focused English descriptions each. Include CTA button labeled exactly “Explore Services” using GradientButton and shadcn-ui Card for consistent layout. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire ServicesSection into the single-page layout with the correct section ID and CTA scroll behavior.

requirements.summary: Create the Portfolio section showcasing 5–7 projects with visuals, campaign goals, and results/metrics, plus a “View Full Portfolio” CTA.
acceptanceCriteria: Portfolio section renders between 5 and 7 project cards/blocks.
Each project card includes: (1) an image, (2) campaign goal text, (3) a results/metrics area including leads and at least one of engagement/ROI.
Portfolio section includes a CTA button labeled exactly “View Full Portfolio”.

file_operations.description: Build Portfolio section rendering 5–7 project cards with visuals and required fields. Reference ad design images from: frontend/public/assets/generated/portfolio-ad-1.dim_1200x900.png through frontend/public/assets/generated/portfolio-ad-7.dim_1200x900.png. Include CTA labeled exactly “View Full Portfolio” using GradientButton and shadcn-ui Card. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire PortfolioSection into the page with the correct section ID for nav/scroll and CTA behavior.

requirements.summary: Create Client Results section with the exact intro text, space for multiple result images/charts, and a “Get Your Results” CTA.
acceptanceCriteria: Client Results section includes the exact provided text.
Client Results section includes a responsive layout area that can display multiple images/charts (e.g., a grid/carousel).
Client Results section includes a CTA button labeled exactly “Get Your Results”.

file_operations.description: Implement Client Results section with the exact provided intro text and a responsive grid (or carousel) that renders multiple result graphics from: frontend/public/assets/generated/results-graphic-1.dim_1400x900.png, results-graphic-2.dim_1400x900.png, results-graphic-3.dim_1400x900.png, results-graphic-4.dim_1400x900.png. Include CTA labeled exactly “Get Your Results” using GradientButton. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire ClientResultsSection into the single-page layout with the correct section ID and CTA scroll behavior.

requirements.summary: Create Testimonials section with the exact supporting text and 3–5 relevant client quote blocks.
acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials section includes between 3 and 5 testimonial quote blocks.
Testimonials section includes the exact provided text: “Our clients love the results we deliver – from creative campaigns to lead generation.”
Testimonials content is in English and clearly relevant to solar-company Meta Ads + creative outcomes.

file_operations.description: Create Testimonials section that includes the exact supporting text and renders 3–5 testimonial quote blocks (English, solar Meta Ads + creative outcomes). Use shadcn-ui Card for testimonial blocks for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire TestimonialsSection into the page with the correct section ID for nav/scroll targeting.

requirements.summary: Create Contact Us section with provided text, email/phone placeholder, and a simple contact form that shows success/failure without third-party services.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact section includes the exact provided paragraph.
Email address is displayed exactly as: solvirostudio@gmail.com.
A phone placeholder is displayed (no real number required).
A simple contact form is present (e.g., name, email, company, message) with a submit button labeled exactly “Contact Me”.
On submit, the UI shows a clear success/failure state without requiring any third-party email service.

file_operations.description: Implement Contact Us section with the exact provided paragraph, display email exactly “solvirostudio@gmail.com”, show a phone placeholder, and render a simple form (name, email, company, message) with submit button labeled exactly “Contact Me”. On submit, call the existing backend capability via the actor (submitContactForm) and show clear success/failure UI states (no third-party integrations). Prefer shadcn-ui Input/Textarea/Button/Alert components where available. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a React hook that uses useActor() to submit contact form data and exposes loading/success/error state for the Contact section UI. Keep it frontend-only and do not introduce any third-party email/SMS providers.
Wire ContactSection into the single-page layout with the correct section ID for nav/scroll targeting and CTA destinations from earlier sections.

requirements.summary: Ensure each major section has the specified prominent CTA and that each CTA performs sensible lead-gen navigation (scrolling to relevant sections) with consistent styling.
acceptanceCriteria: Each major section includes a visible CTA button (matching the specified label where provided).
Clicking each CTA performs a meaningful action (e.g., scrolls to another section such as Contact, Services, or Portfolio).
CTA styling is consistent across sections and uses the brand gradient/accent colors.

file_operations.description: Centralize CTA targets (e.g., Hero → Contact, About → Services, Services → Portfolio, Portfolio → Contact, Client Results → Contact) and pass scroll handlers into each section so CTA clicks produce meaningful in-page navigation.

Ensure all CTAs across sections use a consistent brand-gradient button style (focus/hover/disabled states) and are prominent. Prefer composing shadcn-ui Button. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure the “Get Started Now” CTA is prominent and scrolls to the Contact section. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure the “Learn More” CTA is prominent and scrolls to a sensible section (e.g., Services). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure the “Explore Services” CTA is prominent and scrolls to a sensible next step (e.g., Portfolio). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure the “View Full Portfolio” CTA is prominent and scrolls to a sensible next step (e.g., Contact). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure the “Get Your Results” CTA is prominent and scrolls to Contact. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
